li.label: Avatar of Existence
li.description: wielded the concept of existence taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} path shall never meet it end, for the path of existence lay the foundation of all.

li.label: Avatar of Destruction
li.description: wielded the concept of destruction taken form. no entity should resist {PAWN_nameDef} strike. for {PAWN_nameDef} power is the one absolute.

li.label: Avatar of Order
li.description: wielded the concept of order taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} mind shall be as still as the enlightened one. be the guidance light for those who've lost their way.

li.label: Avatar of Corruption
li.description: wielded the concept of corruption taken form. the mark of the corrupted one. for {PAWN_nameDef} has seen the true depth of abyss. the taint forever remain.

li.label: Avatar of Flame
li.description: wielded the concept of heat taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} light shall be as the brightest star, paved {PAWN_nameDef} road with radiant of gold.

li.label: Avatar of Frost
li.description: wielded the concept of cold taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} heart shall be cold as ice. the frigid star shall envelope {PAWN_nameDef} world in endless cold.

li.label: Avatar of Death
li.description: wielded the concept of death taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} path shall bring an end to all road. for destined death is the final destination of all.

li.label: Avatar of Knowledge
li.description: wielded the concept of knowledge taken form. {PAWN_nameDef} shall seek, take, and steal. for it is {PAWN_nameDef} duty to gather all knowledge. those known to man, and those yet to be known by any.
